thread.title: Miss Sarah Cutler
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Miss Sarah Cutler

author: Miss Sarah Cutler
title: Miss Sarah Cutler
text: Very impressed with the service we received. Ordering was easy and curtains arrived really quickly. Was particularly impressed that we received emails at every stage of the process to let us know what was going on. Quicky, easy, straightforward and reliable. Highly recommended!
